entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blizzard early this morning. Blowing snow. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon with risk of snow squalls. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning then light late in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
